title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 886/88 of 29 March 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 866/84 laying down special measures concerning the exclusion of milk products from inward processing arrangements and from certain usual forms of handling
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 886/88  of 29 March 1988  amending Regulation (EEC) No 866/84 laying down special measures concerning the exclusion of milk products from inward processing arrangements and from certain usual forms of handling
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article I (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 866/84, Â´up to 31 March 1988' is hereby replaced by Â´up to the end of the 1987/88 marketing year'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 April 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 March 1988.
For the Council  The President  I. KIECHLE     (1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 78, 23. 3. 1988, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 90, 1. 4. 1984, p. 27.
(4) OJ No L 28, 1. 2. 1988, p. 1.
